ygData.subject: New list
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t hate me. ;D I took my own advice and I created a new mailing list for Bristlebane. It s purely an OOC list. The URL is:
ygData.messageBody:
Don't hate me. ;D

I took my own advice and I created a new mailing list for Bristlebane. It's purely an OOC list. The URL is:

http://www.onelist.com/subscribe/Bristlebane_EQ_OOC

It's for the exchange of ideas, information, resources, tips, hints, player help, etc. Roleplaying is discouraged. (Hence the OOC title... <grin>) The new list is not meant as an offense, merely as a solution to what is obviously becoming a problem on this list. I've seen a new list on the EQVault page dedicated to roleplaying on another server, so I suppose that there is a demand for RP in mailing lists. But since some of us want purely OOC discussion, I thought the obvious solution would be to create a second list.

Becca
a.k.a. Judi, the Pin-up Girl of Ak'Anon
